newsitem.title: USA: Blue-chip stocks surge; end strong.
newsitem.headline: Blue-chip stocks surge; end strong.

text.p: The Dow Jones industrial average surged in the final minutes of trading Tuesday as investors shifted out of technology stocks and ran to the relative safety of the blue-chip market.

Based on early and unofficial data, the Dow ended up 51.57 points at 6,858.11, reversing the previous session's loss of 50 points. The Nasdaq Composite index, which is laced with technology stocks, was off 3.96 points at 1,331.38. In the broader market, advancing issues led declines 13-11 on active volume of 484 million shares on the New York Stock Exchange.
